update.description:
* PIMPL

* ign-math

* ~~Deprecate~~ Remove `Get*` functions

* Created helper functions to make `linkedGrabbers` private.

* old [CI](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/699/) happy

* Added a `gui::Conversions` class similar to `rendering::Conversions`

* Changed API to use `common::Color` instead of `QColor`
update.title: PIMPLize gui/building/GrabberHandle

content.raw: Yeah I agree it's a great idea! Thanks! I'll be checking it out soon.
content.html: Yeah I agree it's a great idea! Thanks! I'll be checking it out soon.

content.raw:
I switched the `UNIT_Conversions_TEST` from Qtest to gtest in aaaedf5f3acb (branch `pimpl_grabber_handle_scpeters`)

* allows test to be run without a screen
* gives better debugging messages

it's optional, but I think it's a good idea
content.html:
I switched the UNIT_Conversions_TEST from Qtest to gtest in aaaedf5f3acb (branch pimpl_grabber_handle_scpeters)

  • allows test to be run without a screen
  • gives better debugging messages

it's optional, but I think it's a good idea

content.raw: Does this need to be a `QTest`? It seems like a gtest would be sufficient, and they are a little easier to debug
content.html: Does this need to be a QTest? It seems like a gtest would be sufficient, and they are a little easier to debug

content.html: oh only those that have the Q_OBJECT macro which need to be moc'ed.

content.raw: Thanks, I thought everything which used qt had to be in `qt_headers`.
